alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Chariton; Daviess; Grundy; Linn; Livingston; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 11:42AM CDT until July 29 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Chariton County in north central Missouri... Western Linn County in north central Missouri... Eastern Daviess County in north central Missouri... Southern Grundy County in north central Missouri... Carroll County in north central Missouri... Northern Saline County in central Missouri... Livingston County in north central Missouri... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1142 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gilman City to near Utica to near Norborne, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Trenton, Carrollton, Slater, Brunswick, Norborne, Jamesport, Keytesville, Meadville, Hale, Gilman City, Laclede, Bosworth, Linneus, Wheeling, Utica, Wakenda, Chula, Laredo and Gilliam. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Chariton; Daviess; Grundy; Linn; Livingston; Saline
